Desc.entry: A citywide registered charity project that works with young people aged 16-25 years. Offers advice, assistance and support to young people who want to become involved in their communities through voluntary work. Recognises young people's existing voluntary activity. Can arrange a wide range of volunteer opportunities including mentoring/befriending, youth work, arts and media, sports and web design. Also facilitates youth-led initiatives which involve young people developing their own ideas/projects to benefit the community. Welcomes any young person who would like to find out more or register as a volunteer to drop-in to the offices. The project offers access to taster sessions in a variety of volunteer settings, full time volunteering opportunities and opportunities to volunteer as a group. A partnership between SOVA and Sheffield Futures, company limited by guarantee no 3645143.

ContactName.entry: Fiona Ross, Youth Volunteer Development Manager

category.entry: CHILDREN AND YOUNG PEOPLE - WELFARE AND SOCIAL INCLUSION
